publishedBibles.notes: Greek text of Hermann von Soden

translations.name: Moffatt, New Translation
translations.description: Moffatt, New Translation (MNT) is an abbreviation of the title \\\"The Holy Bible Containing the Old and New Testaments, a New Translation\\\" by James Moffatt. In the introduction to his 1926 edition, Moffatt wrote, \\\"The aim I have endeavored to keep before my mind in making this translation has been to present the books of the Old and the New Testament in effective, intelligible English.”

translations.name: Moffatt, New Translation
translations.description: Moffatt, New Translation (MNT) is an abbreviation of the title \\\"The Holy Bible Containing the Old and New Testaments, a New Translation\\\" by James Moffatt. publishedBibles.derived: Revision of the New International Version.

translations.name: New International Version Inclusive Language Edition
translations.description: The New International Version Inclusive Language Edition (NIVI) is an inclusive language edition of the New International Version in which most of the gender specific pronouns were exchanged for gender neutral pronouns. For example, in Mark 1.17 Jesus now says “’Come, follow me,' Jesus said, 'and I will make you fishers of men and women.’”

translations.name: Jane Aitken
translations.description_short: Jane Aitken (July 11, 1764 – August 29, 1832) was an early American printer, publisher, bookbinder, and bookseller.
